header.title: Re-Imagining Supply-Chains
header.subtext: Build new partnerships for value, speed and purpose

box1.title: The end of China-centricism
box1.content: Fashion’s sourcing chains are changing forever. The challenge to find sustainable and long-term alternatives to China is an imperative.

box2.title: New Sourcing Partners
box2.content: The greatest hidden value in sourcing chains is in the ‘first mile’ closest to factories, materials and workers. Developing partnerships with factories can radically improve speed-to-market, significantly reduce risk and improve profitability.

box3.title: Go Beyond the Environment
box3.content: Earning and keeping the trust of customers will require addressing the environmental, social and economic dimensions of sourcing chains. Purpose and profit must be synchronized.

box4.title: Re-wiring the Fashion Calendar
box4.content: The ‘’worn out ritual of seasonalities’’ needs to be replaced by a new system where value is created by fresh, frequent and fast design in season-less product flows
